title: New Project Section! + Updates
body:
I’ve now added a project section to the website, accessible here!
Currently, it only has the maze mapping robot project from a course I took at Cornell University in Fall 2019, but it will have 2 more old projects before I add any future projects.
I’m also considering writing a blog about why neural network report cards should be mainstream and an industry standard. This topic was inspired by one of the papers that was introduced during a TA lead lecture of the NLP course I took this past fall semester. (Paper: Model Cards for Model Reporting)

title: Welcome
body:
Welcome! Welcome to my new personal website and blog, where I will post updates related to my career goals, life goals, and other interesting thoughts that deserve a special place.
I plan to publish reflections, opinions, and other pieces that I sometimes will choose to cross-post on LinkedIn or Medium.
I started building this site about 2 years ago, and I am SO happy that it is finally setup and finished.
